column5: Early 1900's restored historic duplex 5-10 min drive from Downtown SA/Riverwalk, AT&T Center, the Alamo Dome, Alamo or Pearl Brewery. The Dignowity Hill Historical District is undergoing revitalization and development. Numerous houses in the old German community are being restored. It is exciting to see the transformation in process! We are across the street from an elementary school (family friendly area) There are train tracks 4 blocks away. Most don't notice. Ear plugs are in night stand.
column8: Historic Duplex 5-10 min Drive to Alamo/Riverwalk!
